property.value:
SELECT a.* FROM t_funcalloc a WHERE 1=1 /~id: AND a.id = {id} ~/ /~username: AND a.username LIKE {username} ~/ /~location: AND a.location LIKE {location} ~/ /~xgr: AND a.xgr LIKE {xgr} ~/ /~xgsj: AND a.xgsj LIKE {xgsj} ~/ /~xgsjks: AND SUBSTR(a.xgsj,1,10) >= {xgsjks} ~/ /~xgsjjs: AND SUBSTR(a.xgsj,1,10) <= {xgsjjs} ~/
/~sortColumn: ORDER BY [sortColumn] [sortDirection]~/

property.name: sql
property.value:
SELECT a.*,b.dwmc AS sydwmc FROM t_sysuser a LEFT JOIN t_sydw b ON b.id = a.pid WHERE 1=1 and a.username !='admin' /~sydwid: AND a.pid = {sydwid} ~/ /~username: AND a.username LIKE {username} ~/ /~name: AND a.name LIKE {name} ~/ /~sydwmc: AND b.dwmc LIKE {sydwmc} ~/ /~yhfl: AND a.yhfl LIKE {yhfl} ~/
/~sortColumn: ORDER BY [sortColumn] [sortDirection]~/

property.name: sql
property.value: select a.goodsID as goodsID,a.goodname as goodname ,a.rfidID as rfidID ,a.kind as kind,a.spec as spec,a.price as price,a.weight as weight from t_goods a where 1=1 /~goodname: AND a.goodname LIKE {goodname} ~/ /~sortColumn: ORDER BY [sortColumn] [sortDirection]~/
